languages.text: "Слепое уничтожение без раздумий, без сожалений. Без цели. Быть зверем, а не человеком. Сладкий искус для одинокого волка".
"Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."
languages.original_text: "Слепое уничтожение без раздумий, без сожалений. Без цели. Быть зверем, а не человеком. Сладкий искус для одинокого волка".

traits.locale_text: "Blind destruction. No thoughts, no regrets. No purpose. To be as beast, not as human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."
"Blind destruction. No thoughts, no regrets. No purpose. To be as beast, not as human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."
"Blind destruction. No thoughts, no regrets. No purpose. To be as beast, not as human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."
"Blind destruction. No thoughts, no regrets. No purpose. To be as beast, not as human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."
"Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."
"Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."

languages.text: « Destruction aveugle. Aucune pensée, aucun regret. Aucun but. Être une bête, pas un humain. Une perspective alléchante pour un loup solitaire. »
languages.original_text: "Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."

traits.locale_text: « Destruction aveugle. Aucune pensée, aucun regret. Aucun but. Être une bête, pas un humain. Une perspective alléchante pour un loup solitaire. »

languages.text: “盲目的破坏，没有思想，没有遗憾，没有目的。抛弃人类的身份，变成野兽。这对独狼而言是个甜蜜的诱惑。”
languages.original_text: "Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."

traits.locale_text: “盲目的破坏，没有思想，没有遗憾，没有目的。抛弃人类的身份，变成野兽。这对独狼而言是个甜蜜的诱惑。”

languages.text: 「盲目的な破壊。思考はなく、後悔もない。目的もない。人間でなく獣であること。一匹狼にとっては甘い誘惑だ」
languages.original_text: "Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."

traits.locale_text: 「盲目的な破壊。思考はなく、後悔もない。目的もない。人間でなく獣であること。一匹狼にとっては甘い誘惑だ」

languages.text: "Blinde Zerstörung. Keine Gedanken, keine Reue. Kein Ziel. Das Leben als Bestie, nicht als Mensch. Eine süße Versuchung für einen einsamen Wolf."
languages.original_text: "Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Blinde Zerstörung. Keine Gedanken, keine Reue. Kein Ziel. Das Leben als Bestie, nicht als Mensch. Eine süße Versuchung für einen einsamen Wolf."

languages.text: «Destrucción ciega. Sin pensamiento, sin remordimientos. Sin propósito. Ser una bestia, no un ser humano. Una dulce tentación para un lobo solitario».
languages.original_text: "Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."

traits.locale_text: «Destrucción ciega. Sin pensamiento, sin remordimientos. Sin propósito. Ser una bestia, no un ser humano. Una dulce tentación para un lobo solitario».

languages.text: "Gözümü karartan bir yıkım. Fikirsiz, gamsız, amaçsız. İnsan değil, hayvan olmak... Yalnız kurtların aklını çelen bir fırsat."
languages.original_text: "Blind destruction. No thoughts. No regrets. No purpose. To be a beast, not a human. A sweet temptation for a lone wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Gözümü karartan bir yıkım. Hiçbir fikir yok. Hiçbir pişmanlık yok. Hiçbir amaç yok. İnsan değil, hayvan olmak... Yalnız kurtları ayartan bir fırsat."
